alert.note: Alert for Greene; Pickens; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 10:42PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pickens, northwestern Greene and northwestern Sumter Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1042 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Epes, or 7 miles north of Livingston, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Gainesville, Epes, Emelle, New West Greene, Boyd, Panola, West Greene, The University Of West Alabama, Bluffport, Geiger, Warsaw, New Mount Hebron, Sumterville, Pleasant Ridge, Payneville and Lewiston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
